name: Deep in the Darkness
description:
Description:

This game belongs to the rogue like genre. Get in the skin of Jelly and try to scape the darkness you are brought to. Using your adquired abilities, defeat all the enemies you will encounter and reach the light once again.

-Authors:

  • Carlos Castillo
  • Claudio Maiorana
  • Alejandro Jiménez 
  • Jordi Pages
